entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow or rain this afternoon. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
